page.name: Arista Tauran
page.description: Who knew metal from the heart of an asteroid would be able to magically restrain a minotaur?  If it's that powerful, it couldn't hurt to try making a weapon out of it, right?  This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Arista Tauran
properties.description: Who knew metal from the heart of an asteroid would be able to magically restrain a minotaur?  If it's that powerful, it couldn't hurt to try making a weapon out of it, right?  This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: (Mino)torture
page.description: Not even string can help you find your way out of THIS labyrinth. The minotaur who built it wanted to confound any and all intruders, and make it impossible for even the cleverest hero to get out without good deal of luck and persistance.

properties.complete: I wonder if the metal in those shackles would make good weaponry?
